name: df-nv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cnv, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cvc), wf(cv(s2), crn(cv(s0)), cr), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), w3a(wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), nat0), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(cgi, cv(s0)))), wral(s4, cc, wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3))), co(cfv(cabs, cv(s4)), cmul, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))), cle, co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), caddc, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))))))))
comment: Define the class of all normed complex vector spaces. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
